choices: Kanto (Red, Blue, Yellow, Green, FireRed, LeafGreen)
1.content: What region are you in? If you add, keep the towns the same as the games. No I do not claim copyright. I just don't want readers to get confused about towns.
1.title: First thing, what region?

11.content: Are you a boy or girl?
11.title: Kanto

111.content: You are a boy named Ash. You look average not to tall not to short your not weak but your not all that strong. Now its time to go to professor oak because he promised you a pokemon. As you get to the professors lab Gary the proffesors grandson. he says you pick a pokemon first so he can get the pokemon that can beat yours. So you pick............
111.title: Boy

121.content: You're in the Trainers' School, about to take a test. The teacher hands out the papers. What do you write on the Name line? (What's your name?)
121.title: Boy

13.content:
Main Char.: YES I'M THE POKEMON CHAMPION NOW, HAHAHAH!!!

???: Zeo...Zeo...ZEO!!!

Zeo: HO CRAP! Mom, why'd you wake me up?!

Mom: Because you get your pokemon today right?!

Zeo: OH...MY...

Eevee: Meow *YAAAAAAAWN*

Zeo runs out the house still trying to zip up his pants

Zeo: Professor Birch I'm here and I'm late aren't I?

Professor Birch: Very, your friend has been waiting.

Zeo: Damian...wassup?

Damian: DON'T YOU "wassup" ME, I'VE BEEN WAITING WOMAN!

Zeo: DON'T YELL AT ME FOO! AND I'M A MAN!

Another guy walks with orange hair looking real smug, but i shouldn't say that, don't judge a book.

???: Have my pokemon uncle?

Professor Birch: Why of course Ian.

Professor Birch hands him a pokeball with a crescent moon.

Ian: Thanks Uncle

As Ian crosses Zeo they exchange looks. Ian leaves.

Damian: I got my Pokemon, choose yours!

Zeo: Right...Torchic I--

Damian: Taken.

Zeo: Er, Pikachu I--

Professor Birch: We don't give pikachus in this region

Zeo: DAMMIT. Fine, Mudkip, your mine!!!

Zeo presses the button and out come Mudkip.

Mudkip: Kip, Kip?

Zeo: AWSOME!!! Damian what'd you pick?

Damian: See, I'm the smart one, cuz i had Birch to get a favor from a friend in sinnoh so now i have a chimchar. The power of organization!!!

Zeo: Cool...WE SHOULD BATTLE THEN TRAVEL TOGETHER!!!1

Damian: what a plan!!!
13.title: Pokemon Partners!

131.content:
Today, we find our heroes about engage in battle.

Zeo: You ready for this fool?

Damian: Bring it around town moron. GO CHIMCHAR

Chimchar: Chim chim! >:3

Zeo: Mudkip, teach him a lesson!!!

Mudkip: Kip kip!!! =D

Zeo: Mudkip use water gun!!! Mudkip: Kip? Damian: Chimchar ember!!! Chimchar: ...Chim?

Zeo&Damian: Oh right, they don't know those moves yet ._.

???: God, you guys are pathetic

Zeo: Ian, your so smug, someone should take you down a peg!

Ian: Your not ready for me, when you get your first badge talk to me *Takes out 1st badge*

Damian: B-but, you just got your pokemon!

Ian: This is why you are weak. *walks away*

Zeo: I don't like him D=<

Damian: We should get going...

Professor Birch: Wait! Please take these 5 pokeballs and this pokedex.

Zeo: Rockin'!

Damian: Sure!

Our heroes meet up at route 101.

Zeo: My mom is okay with me going.

Damian: My parents are cool with it too. SO LETS GO TO OLDALE!!!

Zeo: HECK YEAH!!!
131.title: Time to go!

14.content: Are you a boy a girl
14.title: Should be easiest question

choices: Goes to check on his pal Barry
141.content:
"Ok check list pokeballs check, potions check, pokegear check, other junk check. Important stuff, cool scarf check, Haunter." Looks at sleeping Haunter. "Check, ok thats everything" Haunter wakes up. "(Hey Dan not thats it important but shoudnt we have some revives?) "Ha! Haunter my friend we won't be needing those. Soon we will be so powerful that not even the legendary Red could beat us!" "(Yeah but till then lets keep them around)" "Eh if you say so"
Dan returns Haunter and runs downstairs. "Hey mom." "Oh honey remember your promises write me every month, remeber to eat, and stay away from girls!" "Calm down mom I have my pen and paper, my phone, and plenty of food. But im all out of girl repelent." "Oh thats because your like your father" Hugs Dan "I love you too mom" Dan walks out front door and quickly trips on a rock. "Ow..." Runs off before anything else happens.
141.title: The Hero!

choices: The man sells Dan the revives
1412.content:
Our young hero now makes his way to the pokemart, a shop where everything a trainer needs is under one roof. Now Dan being the over confident boy he is, begins to wonder around the store looking for revives.

"Now I think they put them. Over here," Dan says, running off in a random direction. Little did the boy know that the store kept all such merchandise behind the counter. Feeling lost Dan once again sent out his Haunter.

The purple ghost pokemon yawned as it appeared from its pokeball. "Haunter this is no time to sleep, i need you help to find revives," Dan said angrily. Seeing his trainer was new and the fact a bit overconfident, Haunter used its telepathic power’s to tell Dan that perhaps he should ask the store keeper if they have any.

"An excellent idea, so glad I thought of it," Dan said out loud, feeling rather pleased with himself. His Haunter however thought very differently. So finally with that over Dan made his way to the counter, where he was greeted by a tall man wearing a blue shirt and white apron.

"Hello and welcome to the pokemart, is there anything I can get for you?" The man asks. Dan replies he is looking for some revives, which surprises the man.

"Ah well, yes we do but, a trainer has to have five gym badges on them before i can sell that item to them."

Dan was shocked, "Five badges, I’ve only just started, surely you can overlook just this once?" Dan said with a gleam in his eye. The man didn't know what to do, he could really get into a lot of trouble for selling revives to Dan, but he also thought that Dan looked a careful trainer.

In the end....
1412.title: Goes to the pokemart

choices: They go looking for someone to battle.
14121.content: "Ok you win, you can buy the revives." said the store manager with his arms crossed. (Ha! I knew my charm would convince him!) Dan thought smiling to himself. "But." Said the manager interupting Dan's thoughts. "You have to pay twice the regular price." Dan snapped back into reality at the 2nd comment. "Huh oh uh sure i have 3000p$ how much is the revive?" "Well the regular price is 1500p$ so doubling it makes 3000p$." Said the manager with Dan's sly tone from earlier. "Oh no problem that mean I have-" Dan stopping at the realization of how much he'd have left, with his mouth wide open in shock. Outside the Pokemart after his purchase Dan and Haunter are talking. "Well I hope your happy! Now were out of money!" Dan said angrily at his Haunter. "(Hey there nothing we can do now except battle someone for some cash.)" Haunter replied causully. "Ok Haunter lets go find someone to battle and defeat in awsome battle!" Dan yelled with fire in his eyes with Haunter waiting for him to finish unimpressed.
14121.title: The man sells Dan the revives

choices: A rock at the the Beedrill
141212.content:
Now Dan maybe a great trainer, but his sense of direction wasn't exactly good shall we say. Before long our hero and his Haunter found them self's lost in Eterna forest.

"I thought, I saw a trainer go down here somewhere," Dan said moving some branches out of his way. His Haunter who was wishing they had just asked for directions followed behind letting the branch Dan let go of pass right through it.

"Listen Dan perhaps we should just sit down and think for a second?" Haunter suggested. But Dan had no time to stop and think, he was going to have to battle day and night if he wanted to beat Red and so he carried on. However our hero soon ran into trouble.

He was carelessly pushing back branches and had somehow managed to let one hit a passing beedrill, who quickly chased after him.
Dan and Haunter ran for their life until finally they took cover behind a fallen tree. The beedrill however was still looking for them, it buzzed around rubbing it stingers together.

Knowing he had to do something, Dan threw...
141212.title: They go to forest.

choices: Leave him he'll be fine when he wakes up
1412121.content:
As the two hid behind a bush they began to formulate a plan to escape "So Dan whats the plan?" Haunter asked, but suddenly felt himself be carried up. "Hey Dan what are you doing." Haunter said looking down at his trainer unsure of whats going on. "Its time to show that bug what were made of." "Now hold on a minute there's a problem with that plan!" "Go!" Haunter flies 3 feet through air before stopping midair, floating. The Beedrill turns toward the noise of the yelling still angry at the two who hit him with the branch.

"Hey genius i'm like 99% gas you might as well have thrown a ballon!" Haunter yells. Dan replies calmly "Ok I'm sorry I should'nt have thrown, also to your left. Haunter swerves to the left in time to dodge Beedrills Tweedledeedle. "Haunter Shadow Punch!" Haunter charges a shadowy aura in his fist a lays it on the Beedrills face sending it spinning. Even though Dan isn't the greatest navigator, or planner, he was a respectable battler. "Haunter finish this with Shadow Ball." Haunter puts his hands in front of him self and charges a dark sphere, and unleashes it on the stunned Beedrill. The Beedrill flies towards tree fainting on impact.

"Well that takes the pain of being lost away." Haunter remarks. "Well thinking on your advise maybe we should head back, this map says we missed the Oreburgh Gym." Dan says looking at a map. "Wait, YOU HAVE A MAP!" "Yeah mom gave it to me before we left." "(Sigh) Fine, lets get going." Haunter turns and sees the Beedrill. "Oh yeah what bout him." Dan looks at the Beedrill and decides....
1412121.title: Throwing Haunter at the Beedrill

choices: Stopped by a young lady named Cheryl.
14121211.content:
Seeing as he did do most the work to beat it, Dan decides he should capture the Beedrill.

"Ok and just by luck mom gave me some poke balls as well," Dan said with a smile. His Haunter sighed, there was so much Dan forgot to tell him.

But now was the time to watch Dan capture skills. He picked out a poke ball from his pocket and threw it at the fainted beedrill, the ball hits and in a flash of red light; beedrill is transported into the ball.

They both watch carefully as the ball falls to the ground, it wiggles once, then again and finally, "Ping!" The capture was complete.

"Nice," Dan said striking a pose. Haunter just shook its head at its trainer. "Perhaps you should left beedrill out to check it's all right." Haunter suggested. Dan agreed, so picking up the ball, Dan then called out his new captured Beedrill.

The bee pokemon appeared in a flash of white light looking rather happy.

"Beeee," it said buzzing around him. "I think it's saying it like you Dan," Haunter said as the beedrill continued to buzz around Dan. Dan was happy to hear that, but all this had got them side tracked. He was never going to beat red at this rate.

"Come on you two, we’re off to Oreburgh!" Dan cheered running ahead. Dan's Beedrill followed happily behind while Haunter once again followed in tail, hoping that perhaps this time they would get somewhere.
14121211.title: Catch the Beedrill

choices: Dan battles Roark at the Gym
141212111.content:
"Finally were here!" Yelled Dan in victory. "Well im just happy we made here alive." Haunter replied with a grin. "Also I believe we shaould catch should add another guy to the team." "Why worried skills aren't enough?" Dan said with his usual smirk. "No, but me and Beedrill may not be enough, I mean this is a gym leader, and it will show him how much catching skill you have." Haunter said with a smile hoping his plan would work. "Hmm your right it would make look cooler, lets get going."

After asking around the PokeCenter a hiker pointed the two towards the mines. "So then Dan who should we catch?" "Don't know but we need somthing cool, like Beedrill." "Beedrill and?" Haunter said trying to remind Dan of himself. "Oh yeah me too now lets go." As two battle Zubats, Geodudes and the occasional Onix, Dan finds what he was looking for. "Dan I getting tired and those rock Pokemon aren't soft ya know." Haunter says rubbing his fist. "No problem Haunter I just found what i was looking for." Dan said as he looks at a small purple Pokemon punching a wal.

"A Tyrouge ay, well whatever you want but im going to sleep." Haunter says touching the Pokeball returning himself. "Fine go Beedrill!" Beedrill pops out of his ball with his a stinger up in the air. "All right im ready Dan!" Beedrill cried out. (Note On the show most trainers seem to understand thier pokemon) The Tyrouge turns around ready for battle. Tyrouge jumps at at Beedrill ready to punch. "Beedrill arial ace!" Beedrill zooms at the enemy overpowering it. The Tyrouge pulls himself up and then uses Karate chop. Beedrill took the hit, but managed stay in the air. "Beedrill finish this with TweedleDeedle!" The attack hits the Tyrouge twice forcing it to its knees. "Time to finish this, go Pokeball!" The ball hits its mark capturing the Tyrouge in the 3 rolls. "Yeah goodjob Beedrill!" "No problem." After the battle Dan returns to the Pokemon center for the night.
141212111.title: Oreburgh city arrival.

1412121112.content:
After his peaceful night at the pokemon centre Dan wakes up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the gym leader. However Dan's Haunter not wanting to kill the moment reminded him that a trainer like Red would explore the town for information on the gym leader.

Dan really didn't like this idea. After all he didn't want to be like Red, he just wanted to beat him. But Haunter had a point.

"Ha all right Haunter we'll go talk to the town's people. I'm sure one of them knows something about the gym leader." Dan said rushing ahead. Haunter once again followed slowly behind wondering perhaps if this was such a good idea he'd come up with.

Luckily Haunter seemed to have pulled the lucky string as soon Dan was running around asking the people of Oreburgh about Roark. They all had good things to say about him but nothing that would help Dan in battle.

"Ok now I got all this useless information, it has to be time to challenge the leader." Dan said to his Haunter behind him.

Haunter thought for a while before saying. “Well, thinking about it Dan, I think we should.....?
1412121112.title: Dan explores the town.

choices: Dan throws Tyrouge out and Roark sends out Geodude
Dan throws out Beedrill and roark sends out Onix
14121211122.content:
"Fine I guess we can give it a shot, we already know he's gonna be using rock pokemon." Replied back "Wait how do we know that?" Dan asked. "Well for one we heared he worked in the mines, second he has the Coal Badge, third the folk around town say hiis Rock Pokeomon are Rock hard." "Well then lets Rock and Roll!"
After the horrible pun Dan prepares his few supplies, go's to the Pokecenter, and gather's his team for the coming battle. Making his way to the gym he begins planning his battle plan. "Ok who to send out Haunter, Tyrouge, Beedrill? Logic dictates I should use Tyrouge since I have no expierince with him." Haunter sighs in his Pokeball hearing the plan.
While walking into the the gym without noticing he bumps into someone." "Oh sorry guyI was just coming back from the mines." Said the stranger. "Huh hmm miner's hat, glasses, your a janitor right!" The stranger stare's at Dan with a blank expression. "Uh no i'm Roark the gym leader, and by the looks of you your a trainer here to challenge me to a battle, right?" "Nope i'm here to beat you!." Dan says taking a pose pointing at Roark who was just staring at Dan confused. "Uh ok,then lets get started!"

The two meet on the field with faces of expierience vs confidence. The referee taking his place explaining the rules The battle will be a 3 on 3, only the challenger is allowed to make substitutions, the battle will be over when one side is out of usable Pokemon, you may begin!" "Lets get this started!" Dan yelled ready for his moment to finally come in his first gym battle.
14121211122.title: Its about time for a Gym battle

141212111222.content:
Dan thinking perhaps every trainer that does come to challenge the gym leader must always send out their strongest pokemon first. So he mixed it up a bit by choosing Beedrill first.

Roark asked him if he really wanted to use a beedrill against his Onix. After all it won't take much for a rock type pokemon to crush a bug type. But Dan was confident; after all he may not be a great trainer like red. But even Red would be impressed with his battle plan.

Finally the battle began and at once onix burrowed underground. Beedrill started to panic but Dan had planned for this too. "Beedrill fly as high as you can." Dan ordered. His Beedrill did as it was told however as it flew up onix popped out the ground with such a force it shot itself up like a rocket.

It looked like Dan would have to use this chance, but what to do attack onix head on in the sky or dodge it?
141212111222.title: Dan throws out Beedrill and roark sends out Onix

1412121112222.content:
Dan having enough logic to see the problem quickly gave his Beedrill a command. "Beedrill get out of there!" Beedrill who was hoping his trainer would say somthing like that happily complies. Beedrill manages to dodge in time leaving the rocketing Onix to hit the ceiling, cratering it and begining its desent. Dan seeing a chance he attempts to captilize. "Beedrill try Poisen Sting!" Beedrill fire's his poisonios barbs at the landing Onix, they hit the target but, fail to do any serios damage.

"Nice try Dan but, it'll take more then that." Roark remarks "Onix Screech!" Onix fires the sonic sound wave, being sound was to fast for Dan to react. Beedrill being a sensitive bug begins to writher in distress. Dan realizing the problem begins to think. "This is bad really bad, better do somthing."
1412121112222.title: Avoid that rocketing snake!

14121211122222.content:
However our young hero is too late and with mighty force behind it, Onix head drives beedrill into the ground.

"Beedrill is unable to battle round 1 goes to Roark," The Ref announced. Dan returned his Beedrill with a encouragement of its good attempt. But Now Dan knew he couldn't muck about. It was time to get serious.

He sent out his Haunter and prepared an attack he was sure would win him the round. "All right let the battle begin!" The ref said and at once the two trainers ordered their pokemon to attack. However onix found it very hard to attack the fast moving ghost pokemon and soon fell to its fast shadow ball attacks.

With it all tied Roark decided to bring out his best. "All right Rampardos, you’re up." The rock leader says, sending out the dinosaur looking pokemon. Dan could see this was the best Roark had, but what pokemon would he use?

Would he keep Haunter out or perhaps it was time to shift to his trump card Tyrogue?
14121211122222.title: Too late Roark attacks

141212111222222.content:
"Ok so far so good." Dan thought to himself but there was still the problem of the Rampardos. He could use Haunter since he was still fresh, but he could have Tyrouge try and wear down Rampardos, but he still didnt know what Roark's 3rd pokemon was. He decided that sticking to Haunter would be best. "Haunter you up for another round?" Dan asked his Haunter. "You say that like what I say will matter." "Exactly!"
Roark who was waiting on Dan called out. "Hey Dan don't worry I know Rampardos can be pretty intimidating!" Dan and Haunter both heard this and got ready.
"Oh were ready for ya Haunter Shadaw Claw!" Haunter charges at his target with his hand powering up. "Nice try Dan, but it won't be enough, Rampardos Zen Headbutt!" Rampardos charges with the enchanted Headbutt. The two hit, but Haunter is overpowered and is sent flying and lightly hits the floor. "Hmhp, Haunter lets try somthing else Sucker Punch!" Haunter zooms in on the Dino punching it on its exposed underbelly forcing it back.
"Oh yeah awesome Haunter!" "Its only natural but its not over yet stay focused Dan." Haunter was right Roark still had plenty of fight left in him.
"Haunter Shadow Ball!" "Rampardos Rock Throw!" Both sides begin firing their respective attacks some being dodge or canceled by eachother. Luckly for Dan a few Shadow Balls got threw and hit the slower dino, while any stray boulders were easily dodged. Roark could tell that things wereb't looking good, but suddenly saw a opening. "Rampardos Zen Headbutt!" "Haunter dodge him quick!" Haunter atempted to dodge that charging dino but wasn't paying attention and was hit by large rock. Pulling himself up Haunter could'nt dodge it in time and knew prepairing for the impact. Dan could only watch as Roarks plan worked perfectly, better then his own plans no less. The impact was devestating Haunter was flung to wall of the gym cratering it, Dan calling him to check on his friend. "Haunter you alright?!" Haunter pulled managed to pull himself up to answer, though obviosly hurt. "Alright meaning I can float around after flying into a wall then yeah." Dan began thinking of a new action Haunter was tough and would still fight if he had to, but he just hit a wall, and looks like Tyrouge may be able to beat the weakened Rampardos. What does he do?
141212111222222.title: Ghost VS Dino

1412121112222221.content:
"Ok Haunter thats enough, come on back!" Dan commanded pointing the ball at Haunter. "Good move Dan, just becareful with Tyrouge." Haunter replied. As Haunter fellback Dan prepared his other Pokeball. "Tyrouge lets show this Dino why he should've stayed a fossil!" Tyrouge flashes out of his ball in a fighting stance excited for a fight. "Yeah who am I gonna fight!" Tyroge cried out in fighting spirit.
Roark wasn't to worried about the small Pokemon. "Well Dan Tyrouge maybe a fighting type but he's a little small don't ya think?" "What!?" Dan yelled in defience clenching his fist with fire in his eyes, Tyrouge doing the same. " Tyrouge maybe small but he has the spirit of a Machamp!" Then theirs a random fireworks from a behind Dan.

"Where the fireworks come from?" Roark questioned. "Tyrouge Mach Punch!" Dan commanded. Tyrouge rushed on Rampardos at blinding and land a hit, though Rampardos wasn't to phased. "Don't worry Dan I'll finish this up Rampardos Giga Impact." "(Perfect)" Dan thought to himself as his own plan began to come together. "Tyrouge hold still." Dan ordered. Tyrouge wasn't sure looking back at Dan, recieving a nod of reasurance from Dan. As Rampardos got closer Roark noticed Tyrouges lack of movement and realized somthing was wrong. "Wait Rampardos!" Roark called out, but it was to late as Dan anounced his move. "Easy! Tyrouge Low Kick!" Tyrouge slide to floor taking Rampardos off the floor making the large Pokemon fall to his own weight and its momentem from its charge. Rampardos fell face first, skidding across the floor tearing it along the way, but Dan wasn't done yet. "Tyrouge Jump Kick!" Tyrouge jumped up into the air dive kicked onto the Rampardos pushing deeper into the floor. "Rampardos!" Roark called out hoping for the best, but all he recieved was Rampardos's defeated cry.

"We did it one more to go Tyrouge!" Dan cheered. "Nope." Dan turned to see Roark walking towards him returning Rampardos at the same time. "Wait what do you mean?" "Dan Rampardos was my strongest pokemon and you were smart enough to beat him with your small, inexperienced Tyrouge." "Hey thats awesome, but what about you third pokemon?" "There's no point Dan my Geodude's tough but you still have Tyrouge and Haunter, besides it would be kinda anti-climatic dont ya think?" "Yeah your right that would be kinda bad, and I am too awesome, so what now." "Well Dan you earned this Coal Badge." Roark finished handing Dan the Coal to Dan. "Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! We got the Coal Badge!" Dan cheered with Tyrouge.

Haunter came out of his Pokeball infront of Dan. "Why do I even have you in the ball if you can get out just like that?" "No real reason, but anyway Dan you got the Coal Badge great, but me and Beedrill need to get some rest." "Hehehe ok lets get going later Roark!" Dan called walking out of the gym. "Well bye Dan I guess, good luck!" As Dan walked he began his way to the next city.
1412121112222221.title: Put Tyrouge to the test.

14121211122222211.content:
Dan's walk to Floaroma Town soon turned into a run as he dashed through Oreburgh Gate, raced past route 203 and continued on his way, though of course he took the time to stop in Jubilife City to heal his pokemon before heading off again towards Route 204. The route was filled with trainers with all kind of different pokemon which Dan along with the help of Haunter and Beedrill took on and defeated earning his pokemon some experience.

Finally after many battles our young hero arrives outside Floararma town. Taking a deep breath in, Dan couldn't help but smell the fresh scent of honey in the town's air. Haunter, who had escaped from it pokeball once agian also seemed to be a fan of the smell.

"It's so sweet" Haunter said dreamily to its trainer. Dan had to agree the smell was very nice and upon entering the town Dan and haunter soon found out why. The town had flowers growing everywhere. On the path, on people's homes it was like a flower heaven. But what also caught Dan's eye was the many bug pokemon flying around the flowers. They all looked very happy just buzzing about the flowers.

"Oh I know." Though Dan reaching for Beedrill’s pokeball. "Beedrill come out and enjoy the flowers."

In a flash of white light, Dan's Beedrill appeared from its pokeball. Stretching its stringers high in air, the pokemon suddenly stopped and began sniffing the air. Dan watches for a few moments until Beedrill started to dance happily.

"I think Beedrill's a fan." Haunter says to Dan, who nods happily watching Beedrill dance in the air. However, while Dan was busy watching his pokemon enjoying itself with the smell of the flowers, His Haunter notices a single yellow flower slowly creeping up on Beedrill from a patch of nearby flowers. The flower gets closer and closer until.

"Dan that flower moving" Haunter shouts waving it hands about like mad. Dan snaps out of his honey daze just in time to see the flower jump out. The flower turned out to be the top of a Skiploom's head and now it was flying towards Beedrill with an angry look on its face.

Dan knew this was trouble and at once ordered Beedrill, who had heard Haunter shouting to...
14121211122222211.title: Sweet sweet  Floarama Town

choices: On wards towards the Eterna forest
141212111222222111.content:
"Beedrill Twinneedle!" Beedrill facing the approaching Skiploom jabbed it with one of it's stingers, stunning it before hitting it with it's other stinger. The Skiploom fell KOd by the super effective. "What was that about?" Dan asked running to his Beedrill.

"Oh no not again!" a woman said running towards the Skiploom.

"Is that your Skiploom?" Dan asked the woman.

"Yes I'm terrible sorry about this, me and Skiploom come here everyday. He's gotten abit accustomed to this little spot and doesn't like to sharing it your Beedrill was just the fourth time this week he attacked another Pokemon." The woman said bowing apologetically.

Dan tipped his hat "No harm done madam, my Pokemon and I are well trained and fierce." He said pointing towards Beedrill and Haunter, as Beedrill played in the flowers as Haunter watched sitting down.

"I see, well if there's anything I can do to make up for it let me know." The woman said turning back home.

"Wait now that you mention it Florama town wouldn't happen to have a gym would it?" Dan asked.

"Oh I'm sorry but the nearest gym is up north past the the Eterna forest, it's a long way why go right now there are lots of things to do here. Why not go to check out the Wind works before leaving?" The woman asked.

"Yeah maybe." Dan said thinking "Oh is that your Skiploom again?" Dan said pointing at Skiploom as it charged at five Combees.

"Oh no not again Skiploom!" The called running after him.

"Well then Haunter, Beedrill come here time to get!" Dan said returning Beedrill.

"So then where are we off to then?" Asked Hauter asked his trainer.
141212111222222111.title: Attack with Twinneedle!

1412121112222221111.content:
"We're off to the windworks partner?" Dan said like he was some western cowboy. Haunter merely sighed at his trainer he knew this would happen someday. Still marching on forward Dan finds himself in a few battle before finally being stopped by a little girl.

"Um excuse me mister but can you help me?" she asked in her tiny voice. Dan was sure he could and he asked the little girl what was wrong?

"Well my daddy works at the wind works and today I was walking him to worked like every other day, when suddenly these funny dressed men came out of the tall grass grabbed him and took him away towards the wind works and left me here."

This didn't sound good to Dan and from the moved grass around them he could only guess this kidnapping had only happened a few minutes ago. It sounded tough but Dan told the little girl he would find her dad for her. She was pleased to hear this and watch as proudly Dan made his way to the towards the wind works. However on arriving at the wind works Dan found himself confronted by one of the funny dressed men.

"What are you doing her Kid" the muscle bound man asked blocking the door. Dan told him that he wanted to get into the wind works which the man merely replied " You want to get in ha. To do that your goanna have to battle me and win kid."

Dan was ready and with that it was time to select their pokemon. The funny dress guy sent out a cat like pokemon which Dan knew, thanks to quick look at his pokedex was named Glameow.

"All right then funny dress guy I choose.....
1412121112222221111.title: To the Windworks of wind?

14121211122222211112.content:
"Alrighty then! Let's go Beedrill!" Dan announced as he threw his Poke-ball releasing his Pokemon, who precceded to thrust his left stinger into the air excitedly. Wasting no time Dan quickly moved on to the attack, "Beedrill use Twineedle!"

Beedrill rushed in on Glameow throwing the two jabbing stingers at the cat Pokemon. "Glameow! Dodge and use Scratch!" The cat readily replied sidestepping both of the jabs, before retaliating with a scratch to Beedrill's face. Beedrill recoiled for a second before regaining it's control.

"Ha!" The muscular man laughed "Face it kid your out matched give up now, and maybe I'll let you off with a warning."
"Ha!" Dan laughed back "Jokes on you I don't give up until it a too late! Beedrill Fury attack!"
"Glameow counter with Fury Swipes!" The helmet haired man said.

The two Pokemon began attacking each other back and forth with their attacks, and the Pokemon that overpowered the other was.
14121211122222211112.title: Beedrill

141212111222222111122.content:
Falling to the ground Beedrill let out a small cry before fainting. This was quite a shock to Dan and made the muscular man evil smirk.

"See kid, now why don't you get lost!" The man said with his Glameow purring happy. Still Dan knew he couldn't just give up not when he had his next pokemon.

Shaking his head with a smile, Dan thanked Beedrill for it help before returning it to it's pokeball.

"Sorry but I made a promise and I'm certainly not going to give up just because of a lucky attack." Dan joked watching as the Muscular man's smirk grew into a curled angry lip. What right did this kid have to call his attack lucky! He demanded Dan send out his next pokemon which in return made Dan smile. If there was any pokemon who could take Glameow you knew it would be Hhaunter.

So with a smile and his heart pounding from excitement, Dan calls Haunter from its pokeball. It was then in a flash of white light from the ball that Haunter appeared in front of him. Only Haunter didn't seem as excited to face its foe as Dan was.

"Dan you berry head!" Haunter said telepathically to it's trainer seeing its foe. "What?" said Dan addressing Haunter directly forcing the ghost pokemon to face him and shout..

"That pokemon is a normal type!"

Now Dan being Dan had to check this out and luckily he had time to as the muscular man seemed a little stunned at the fact a Haunter just talked. Now as much as Haunter wanted to help his trainer battle, Haunter drifted over to Dan, who was still listening to his pokedex.

"Dan" it said. Dan ignored it at first but after finally finishing with the pokedex Dan told Haunter he had a plan to battle Glameow. However before Dan could explain Haunter told his trainer he had a plan as well. Whispering to his trainer, Haunter told Dan they could fake a spooky body take over, where they could pretend Haunter takes over Dan which would scare the muscle head trainer away leaving them without having to battle.

Now Dan wasn't one to run away from a fight but perhaps Haunter was right. After all since Glameow knew fury swipes there was a chance it knew faint attack to meaning Haunter had no chance of winning. Still giving both idea some thought the young trainer......
141212111222222111122.title: Glameow beats out Beedrill!

choices: Use the revive he could buy another
Run back to Pokemon center and rush back
1412121112222221111222.content:
"Ok lets do it." Dan whispered to his Haunter.

"What are you doing!?" The man yelled finally getting over his shock "You going to run along now?"

Dan smiled under his hat, as Haunter's plan began. "OH NO! Haunter please no, not again!" Dan said in horror as Haunter approuched him meaningly, his eyes turning red in a glare, his pody glowing. "AAAHHHHH!" Dan screamed as Haunter envolped him in a gas. As the gas dissapated Dan was standing in the same spot, his head and arms hanging down as if a puppet.

The muscular man, was staggering back in fear, his Glameow hiding behind him with it's ears down hissing at Dan. "Hey kid you ok?" The man said more in hopes of this not turning into what he thought rather then Dan's saftey.

"Foolish Mortal! I was kept in that prison long enough!" Dan said in ghostly voice that sounded like his voice in usion with Haunters, "I will have my revenge on those who have imprisoned me! But first a little snack." Dan said devilishly turning to the muscular man.

The mans Glameow was now cligging onto it's masters head in fear, as he was now taking several steps back " NO! NO! STAY AWAY FROM ME!" The man yelled in terror as he broke into frentic sprint away from the possessed boy.

When the man was out of hearing range Dan began joking with his regular voice"OHHH your soul will be mine mortal!" Dan laughed as the man continued to scream as he ran. "Better then on Halloween last year eh Haunter, your getting better with those tricks almost thought I was a goner."

Haunter chuckled"Oh it's nothing any ghost pokemon can do it, I just happen to good at it, but we have buisness to finish." Haunter said pointing to the Wind works building.

"Right and Mr.Muscles here left these for us" Dan said holding the keys to front door, "So lets get going!" Dan announced begining to march, before being stopped by Haunter.

"Hold on now, we don't know how many guys are in there and Beedrill is down, me and Tyrouge might not be enough, we should head back and fix him up, or if you don't want to go back we could use that revive of yours."

Dan decided to.......
1412121112222221111222.title: Went with Haunter's plan

choices: on the kidnappers, who were leaving.
to find the kidnapper still busy qustioning the girl's kidnapped father,
14121211122222211112222.content:
Not wanting to waste his only revive, our young hero decided to run back to the pokemon centre to heal his team. With that he strung into action and ran as fast as he could passing the small girl calling back.

"Don't worry, i'll be back in two seconds!"

The little girl however didn,t know what to say back. She was confused about what she just saw. Still back with our young hero, he quickly dashes into the empty pokemon centre and stops dead just before Nurse Joy's counter. The nurse quite surpised at the entrance was about togreet him when Dan inturped her saying.

"Sorry no time. Pokemon. Heal...Bad guys..Windmill..please. "

Normally Nurse joy would ask why the rush? However this time she said nothing only nodding as she took Dan's pokemon and healed them in the healing machine as fast as she could. Dan impatiently began to jog on the spot wanting to go as soon as he could until finally after a few mintues Nurse joy came back with his pokemon.

"Here you go" she said as Dan quickly grabbed them before dashing out again. He raced back to windmill once agian dashing past the girl saying, "Dont worry i got it."

He arrival at the entrance to the windmill couldn't be any better for as he opened the door...
14121211122222211112222.title: Run back to Pokemon center and rush back

141212111222222111122222.content:
Dan walked into the Wind Works his team prepped, unlocking the door the found more of the bowl haired men to greet them though most then not as buff as the man at the door.
Luckily, Haunter, Beedrill, and Tyrouge, were able to plow through the Zubats and Geodudes.

"Well that was easy." Dan said to Haunter, as he beat another one of the men.

The man with hair returned his fainted Zubat, grumbling to himself. "Darn it! Commander Mars is going to let me have it for this!"

"Don't feel bad, I'm a astonishingly handsome, talented, young, handsome, smart, handsome, coordinated and handsome trainer." Dan said crossing his arms.

"And he's modest too." Haunter added on.

"And what is going on here?" Asked a woman with red hair entering from the right. "I heard there was a boy causing commotion, but I thought you fools could handle it." Scowled the woman at her underlying. "So boy I'll ask kindly, leave now Team Galactic doesn't need some kid in our way."

"Justice never runs away!" Dan yelled pumping his fist into the air. "Now then, why are you here and what are doing to that little girls dad!"

"I wouldn't expect someone like you to understand our plans" Mars said pulling out a Pokeball "but I'll cut you a deal, you beat me and my men will leave here nice and easy, I win you get out of our way." She finished throwing out her Purugly, the large cat Pokemon crying out as it landed.

"Fine by me! Haunter return!" Dan said remembering how much trouble they had with Glameow. "I was planning to do that anyways!" Dan announced as he pulled out the Pokeball that belonged to-
141212111222222111122222.title: ..when a dashing rouge enters the scene!

info.brief_description: Go on your own Pokémon journey!
info.description:
Welcome to my interactive story! You're a brand new 10-year-old Pokémon Trainer!
RULES

1. KEEP THIS ASR RATED! No adult content please. (NO VORE, NO RAPE, NOR ANYTHING ELSE RELATED)
2. Chapters can be short, but not TOO short.
3. Have fun!
